data.email:
Subject: Follow-Up: Cross-Functional Planning & Q4 Roadmap

Hi team,

Thanks for a productive cross-functional planning session today. We covered a lot, from sprint scheduling and backlog prioritization to upcoming design handoffs. It was great to align on finalizing our next sprint’s roadmap and improving visibility into task dependencies to prevent bottlenecks.

**Key Decisions**
• Approved the sprint roadmap for our Q4 initiatives.
• Agreed to start weekly progress reviews every Monday morning.

**Action Items**
• Riley & Sofia — Finalize Q4 roadmap slides by Friday.
• Diego — Audit backlog and flag dependency blockers by Thursday.
• Taylor & Nina — Share finalized sprint calendar with all leads by Monday.
• Casey — Prepare design handoff checklist.

**Next Meeting:** Next Monday 9 AM

Appreciate everyone's focus on getting these Q4 initiatives ready.
Best,
[Your Name]
